SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>That was real hairy...<sp:5:1:0> Honestly, I thought
I was done for there.

I baaarely came out of that alive. Thanks
a lot, friend.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, friend! Explored any caves lately?


That's where almost all ore is these days.
And given caves are everywhere, that
means they're an easy way to find ore.
But finding isn't keeping. You'll bump into
monsters you won't see up here. It's a
whole different world in those caves.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Still, hard to resist trying to strike it
rich down there!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Attacked that brutally... It would have
been dicey if you hadn't showed up.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh man. That was close...<sp:5:1:0> Guess I can
always rely on you, friend!
Com_Talk_30:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:ffff>You want to buy some, eh? How many do
you want?
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Strong monsters get me in a panic! You've
got some brawn on you, friend!
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Look at you, friend! I let my guard down
and you rush in to save me.
Com_Talk_05c:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Anything you want to sell me? Keep
it coming!
ShopGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, enough of that. Want to see what
I'm selling? Fairly proud of what I've
got in stock.
ShopGreet_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That aside, how about some trading? I'm 
pretty happy with what I've got in stock.
Com_Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>I'm sold out of everything, thanks to you!<sp:5:0:0>
I've got to stock up again!
Com_Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm sold out of everything I've got! Thanks
for being such a great customer.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'll stock up again. But you can always
check what I've got so you remember
what I sell.
Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Welcome!<sp:5:1:0> Glad to greet a customer
anytime and anywhere!
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Destruction from the Upheaval made it
harder for people to travel to shops.

That's why people in my line of work—<sp:5:0:0>the
folks who bring your goods to YOU—<sp:5:0:0>are
so important right now.
We're basically the glue holding this
cracked-up world together...<sp:5:0:0>and glue
doesn't go home when it's raining!
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You don't typically see stamella shrooms
around here, but you can find them in
other regions.
You can cook some great dishes with
them, meals that'll get you going again
when you get tired during your travels.
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare_00>No way. What is THAT? What can I even
do?!
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Hey there, friend. You mind if I get
something off my chest? Oh, yeah.
I had a bad time of it.
I went into a cave and saw a monster
that's going to haunt my dreams.

The thing...<sp:5:1:0>stretched.


And then contracted. Over and over—
stretched, then contracted.

I think it can eat anything. Yeeesh.
Right down the gullet.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>One of them gulped down my stock.
Cried myself dizzy. I bet their stomachs
are crammed full of stuff.
<snd:Ease_00>Really...<sp:5:1:0>dang it.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Some ingredients can stop you from
tiring out as quickly.

That's why I like cooking with
endura carrots!

They're harder to come by these days,
but I hear some can be found in the
mountains here.
I know—steep. But those tasty carrots are
worth the climb!
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Sad>Stretching, contracting. Over and over.
Ugh. Those darn monsters.

Next time I see one, I'm going to drag it
right out of its cave—hard!

Those things have got to be full of stuff
they've swallowed. Doesn't matter what
it is. Sure, yeah. Gulp it down. Gross.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>Whew...<sp:5:1:0>I feel better after getting all
that off my chest. Thanks, friend.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Hey, friend. Tired from all your traveling
around yet?

Cook dishes with stamella shrooms
whenever you're tired of being tired.
They'll help you recover stamina.
Stamella shrooms don't really grow near
here. So keep an eye out for them while
traveling elsewhere.
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Hey there, friend. I've been thinking
about a beautiful rumor...

It's said that there's a cherry-blossom
tree in the mountains around here that
blossoms all year round.
And also...<sp:5:1:0>that a strange, wondrous
creature called Satori sometimes hides
away there.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'd love to see such a wonder once in
my life.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_00>Hey, friend. Been feeling too tired, too
quickly lately?

Then you should cook dishes that have
endura carrots in them. Those will boost
the upper limit of your stamina.
Oh, yeah. Those are tasty dishes for
those of us who need to work for a
longer time before we tire out.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Endura carrots are said to grow in the
mountains around here. I mean, just
so you know.
Although, it's fairly hard work to get up
a mountain, isn't it?
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Traveling merchants like me, the ones
pulling wagons? When it's raining, we
don't get to take the day off.
You know why? Because people need us!
They need us to bring them elixirs,
ingredients...other stuff!
Especially now that the Upheaval's made
it harder to walk to shops.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>We're basically the glue holding this
cracked-up world together!
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>I'm curious what that creature known as
Satori is truly like?

It's said to be hiding atop one of the
peaks here, where a cherry-blossom tree
stays in full blossom all year round.
Com_Talk_04: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>OK by me. I've been doing just fine.
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Here's a reward for rescuing me. Thank
you, truly!
ShopGoodBye_01: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Thanks! Call on me whenever you like.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>I'm going to strike it rich in caves
someday by grabbing all the ore I can.
You should do it too, friend. If you can.
Got to admit, though, I'm scared of
what's lurking in caves. You won't see
any of THOSE monsters up here.
Com_Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Notice>Oops, not enough rupees. Sorry there.
We'll have to do that another time.
Com_Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Looks like your pouch is full. Come back
once you've made room.
Com_Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>I like what I've got in stock. Have a look.
Take all the time you need.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You're, uh, wearing that right now, friend.
Sell it to me after you take it off.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't even tell you how many times
an energizing elixir has saved me when
I've needed...<sp:5:0:0>to go...<sp:5:0:0>a little farther!
You'll need restless crickets. Easy
enough to find. Cut some grass, and
grab them when they hop out.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Oh, yes. I can vouch for those elixirs!<sp:5:1:0>
I just can't get ahold of the monster
parts you'll need as easily.
Com_Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Look for as long as you like. Don't let
the weather stand in the way.
Talk_0130:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'll trade in the worst weather, so just
call on me whenever!
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Hey, friend! Working hard?


<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're ever low on fuel, make yourself
some energizing elixir.

First, you'll need restless crickets. Cut
some grass, and watch those li'l guys
jump out. Catch them quick.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Then mix those with monster parts to
whip up an energizing elixir!

That elixir really helps in a pinch. Can't
recommend it enough.
Com_Talk_11_c:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>I stand by these items with pride. Glad
you bought something you like.
